summary: American seminary student Michael Kovak (Colin O'Donaghue) travels to Italy to take an exorcism course.
cast: Anthony Hopkins|Colin O'Donoghue|Alice Braga|Ciarán Hinds|Toby Jones|Rutger Hauer|Marta Gastini|Maria Grazia Cucinotta|Arianna Veronesi|Andrea Calligari|Chris Marquette|Torrey DeVitto|Ben Cheetham|Marija Karan|Rosa Pianeta|Giampiero Ingrassia|Rosario Tedesco|Cecilia Dazzi|Attila Bardóczy|Nadia Kibout|Anita Pititto|Sandor Baranyai|Fabiola Balestriere|Anikó Vincze|Adriano Aragon|Peter Arpesella|Jasper Jacob|Nico Toffoli|Beatrice Zentai
title: El rito
